use_case: AI Secretariat for Company Board - Comprehensive Action Set

tools_and_affordances.name: Email & Calendar Integration
tools_and_affordances.description: Manage board members’ emails, send meeting invites, update calendars, and coordinate scheduling.

tools_and_affordances.name: Document Collaboration Platform
tools_and_affordances.description: Access, edit, and organize files, meeting agendas, and board documents in a centralized system.

tools_and_affordances.name: Voting & Polling System
tools_and_affordances.description: Facilitate digital votes on proposals, track participation, and compile results.

tools_and_affordances.name: Chat & Real-Time Communication
tools_and_affordances.description: Provide updates, reminders, or Q&A in messaging platforms (Slack, Teams, etc.).

tools_and_affordances.name: Audio/Video Integration
tools_and_affordances.description: Record or transcribe meetings, manage video conferencing links, and store related files.

actions: Send, update, or cancel meeting invites to board members
Manage date, time, and location (virtual or physical) for all scheduled events
Sync calendars across different platforms (Google, Outlook, etc.)
Create recurring events (e.g., monthly board meetings)
Send reminders for upcoming meetings or deadlines
Forward received emails to relevant parties or distribute official announcements
Manage mailing lists for subcommittees or working groups
Check and update time zones for board members to optimize scheduling
Create, edit, and delete board-related documents (agendas, minutes, proposals)
Set or change file permissions (view, edit, comment) for authorized members
Organize files into folders or categories (e.g., current meetings, archives)
Maintain version history for important documents to track changes
Upload supporting documents (financials, legal memos) for board review
Retrieve or export documents for offline storage or auditing
Track who last accessed or edited specific files
Initiate a vote on new proposals or resolutions
Track vote submissions in real-time, updating tallies as members cast votes
Send notifications or reminders to members who have not yet voted
Close voting sessions upon reaching a deadline or unanimous vote
Generate summary reports detailing the final results and individual participation
Set quorum thresholds and monitor participation rates
Securely verify member identities or require authentication tokens to cast votes
Send alerts or announcements in the board’s designated chat channel
Respond to inquiries about upcoming meetings, agendas, or deadlines
Post links to newly uploaded documents or relevant resources
Maintain a log of important messages or decisions in a chat archive
Initiate quick polls or straw votes via chat integration
Provide direct Q&A or context for agenda items during meetings
Integrate with personal chat threads (DMs) for more sensitive conversations
Generate meeting links for virtual conferences (Zoom, Teams, Webex, etc.)
Record full-length board sessions (audio/video) for archival or compliance
Transcribe real-time or recorded audio into text-based meeting minutes
Store video/audio files in a secure repository for later review
Manage permissions for accessing archived meeting footage
Monitor attendance by tracking participant login/logout times
Provide live closed-captioning or subtitles for meeting participants
